remarks: The predicate "is an atomic lattice with the covering (or exchange) property".  (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
iscvlat2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
iscvlat2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
iscvlat2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
iscvlat2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
iscvlat2.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
iscvlat2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
iscvlat2N $p |- ( K e. CvLat <-> ( K e. AtLat /\ A. p e. A A. q e. A A. x e. B ( ( ( p ./\ x ) = .0. /\ p .<_ ( x .\/ q ) ) -> q .<_ ( x .\/ p ) ) ) ) $.
$d A p q x $.
$d B x $.
$d K p q x $.
